/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a car on the road, giving a sense of being in the midst of the action. The street is lined with buildings and trees, creating a corridor of urban life. Cars are parked along the sides of the road, hinting at the busy nature of the city. The sky above is overcast, casting a soft light over the scene. The colors in the image are muted, adding to the overall calmness of the scene.
